articles.description: CarTrade Share Price | On Sunday, CNBC-TV18 had reported, citing sources, that Highdell Investment and MacRitchie Investments Pte have initiated a block trade in CarTrade. The sources added that the block deal was valued ₹400 crore, with an option to increase…
articles.content: As many as 71 lakh shares, or 15.1% equity, of CarTrade Tech worth 588.3 crore changed hands at 828 per share in block deals on Monday, June 24.The official buyers and sellers of the block deal are n… [+1125 chars]

articles.title: No one can figure out what Nvidia's revenues are actually going to be—not even the AI chip leader's own executives - Fortune
articles.description: Nvidia’s revenue has exceeded the midpoint of the company’s own forecast by an average of 13%, more than twice the average over the past decade.
